info.title: ApiManagementClient
info.description: Use these REST APIs for performing operations on Workspace entity and its associated entities within your Azure API Management deployment.

get.description: Lists all workspaces of the API Management service instance.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: |     Field     |     Usage     |     Supported operators     |     Supported functions     |</br>|-------------|-------------|-------------|-------------|</br>| displayName | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |</br></br>| description | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |</br>

200.description: Paged Result response of workspaces.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

head.description: Gets the entity state (Etag) version of the workspace specified by its identifier.

200.description: Gets the entity tag of the workspace

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets the details of the workspace specified by its identifier.

200.description: The response body contains the specified workspace entity.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates a new workspace or updates an existing one.

201.description: Workspace was successfully created.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

200.description: Workspace successfully updated

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

patch.description: Updates the details of the workspace specified by its identifier.

200.description: Workspace successfully updated

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Deletes the specified workspace.

200.description: The workspace was successfully deleted.

204.description: The workspace was successfully deleted.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Get the policy configuration at the workspace level.

200.description: Workspace Policy Collection.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

head.description: Gets the entity state (Etag) version of the workspace policy specified by its identifier.

200.description: Specified workspace Policy entity exists and current entity state version is present in the ETag header.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Get the policy configuration at the API level.

200.description: Workspace Policy information.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates or updates policy configuration for the workspace.

201.description: Workspace policy configuration was successfully created.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

200.description: Workspace policy configuration of the tenant was successfully updated.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Deletes the policy configuration at the workspace.

200.description: Successfully deleted the policy configuration at the workspace level.

204.description: Successfully deleted the policy configuration at the workspace level.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists a collection of named values defined within a workspace in a service instance.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: |     Field     |     Usage     |     Supported operators     |     Supported functions     |</br>|-------------|-------------|-------------|-------------|</br>| tags | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith, any, all |</br>| displayName | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |</br>

parameters.name: isKeyVaultRefreshFailed

values.description: Entities for which KeyVault refresh failed.
Entities for which KeyVault refresh succeeded

parameters.description: Query parameter to fetch named value entities based on refresh status.

200.description: A Collection of the named value entities for the specified workspace in an API Management service instance.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

head.description: Gets the entity state (Etag) version of the named value specified by its identifier.

200.description: Specified named value entity exists and current entity state version is present in the ETag header.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets the details of the named value specified by its identifier.

200.description: The response body contains the specified named value entity. No secrets included

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates or updates named value.

201.description: Named value was successfully created.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

location.description: Location header contains the URL where the status of the long running operation can be checked

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

202.description: Request to refresh secret was accepted.

parameters.description: |     Field     |     Usage     |     Supported operators     |     Supported functions     |</br>|-------------|-------------|-------------|-------------|</br>| name | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |</br>

200.description: Lists a collection of Schema entities.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

head.description: Gets the entity state (Etag) version of the Schema specified by its identifier.

200.description: Specified Schema entity exists and current entity state version is present in the ETag header.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates new or updates existing specified Schema of the workspace in an API Management service instance.

201.description: The new Schema was successfully added.

location.description: Location header contains the URL where the status of the long running operation can be checked

get.description: Lists a collection of properties defined within a service instance.

200.description: A Collection of the Notification for the specified workspace in a API Management service instance.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets the details of the Notification specified by its identifier.

200.description: The response body contains the specified Notification.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Create or Update API Management publisher notification for the workspace.

200.description: Notification was successfully updated.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets the list of the Notification Recipient User subscribed to the notification.

200.description: The response body contains the Recipient User collection for the notification.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

head.description: Determine if the Notification Recipient User is subscribed to the notification.

204.description: The User is subscribed to receive the notification.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Adds the API Management User to the list of Recipients for the Notification.

201.description: Recipient User was successfully added to the notification list.

200.description: Recipient User is already part of the notification list.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Removes the API Management user from the list of Notification.

200.description: Recipient User was successfully removed from the notification list.

204.description: Recipient User was successfully removed from the notification list.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets the list of the Notification Recipient Emails subscribed to a notification.

200.description: The response body contains the Recipient Email collection subscribed to the notification.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

head.description: Determine if Notification Recipient Email subscribed to the notification.

204.description: The Users is subscribed to receive the notification.

404.description: The Users is not subscribed to receive the notification.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Adds the Email address to the list of Recipients for the Notification.

201.description: Recipient Email was successfully added to the notification list.

200.description: Recipient Email is already part of the notification list.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Removes the email from the list of Notification.

200.description: Recipient Email was successfully removed to the notification list.

204.description: Recipient Email was successfully removed to the notification list.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets all policy fragments defined within a workspace.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: |     Field     |     Usage     |     Supported operators     |     Supported functions     |</br>|-------------|-------------|-------------|-------------|</br>| name | filter, orderBy | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |</br>| description | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |</br>| value | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |</br>

200.description: Successfully returned an array of policy fragments.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

head.description: Gets the entity state (Etag) version of a policy fragment.

200.description: The specified policy fragment exists and the current entity state version is present in the ETag header.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets a policy fragment.

200.description: Successfully returned a policy fragment.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates or updates a policy fragment.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The policy fragment contents to apply.

200.description: The policy fragment was successfully updated.

ETag.description: Current entity state version

location.description: Location header contains the URL where the status of the long running operation can be checked

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: Azure-AsyncOperation header contains the URL where the status of the long running operation can be checked

201.description: The policy fragment was successfully created.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

location.description: Location header contains the URL where the status of the long running operation can be checked

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: Azure-AsyncOperation header contains the URL where the status of the long running operation can be checked

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Deletes a policy fragment.

200.description: The policy fragment was successfully removed.

204.description: The policy fragment successfully removed by previous request or does not exist.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Lists policy resources that reference the policy fragment.

200.description: Successfully returned an array of references to policy resources that include the policy fragment in their definitions.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists a collection of user entities associated with the group.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: |     Field     |     Usage     |     Supported operators     |     Supported functions     |</br>|-------------|-------------|-------------|-------------|</br>| name | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |</br>| firstName | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |</br>| lastName | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |</br>| email | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |</br>| registrationDate | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt |     |</br>| note | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |</br>

head.description: Checks that user entity specified by identifier is associated with the group entity.

204.description: Entity exists

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Add existing user to existing group

201.description: The user was successfully added to the group.

200.description: The specified user is already a member of the specified group.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Remove existing user from existing group.

200.description: The user was successfully removed from the group.

204.description: The user was successfully removed from the group.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all releases of an API. An API release is created when making an API Revision current. Releases are also used to rollback to previous revisions. Results will be paged and can be constrained by the $top and $skip parameters.

parameters.description: |     Field     |     Usage     |     Supported operators     |     Supported functions     |</br>|-------------|-------------|-------------|-------------|</br>| notes | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |</br>

get.description: Gets the details of the API specified by its identifier in the format specified to the Storage Blob with SAS Key valid for 5 minutes.

parameters.name: format

values.description: Export the Api Definition in OpenAPI 2.0 Specification as JSON document to the Storage Blob.
values.name: Swagger

values.description: Export the Api Definition in WSDL Schema to Storage Blob. This is only supported for APIs of Type `soap`
values.name: Wsdl

values.description: Export the Api Definition in WADL Schema to Storage Blob.
values.name: Wadl

values.description: Export the Api Definition in OpenAPI 3.0 Specification as YAML document to Storage Blob.
values.name: Openapi

values.description: Export the Api Definition in OpenAPI 3.0 Specification as JSON document to Storage Blob.
values.name: OpenapiJson

parameters.description: Format in which to export the Api Details to the Storage Blob with Sas Key valid for 5 minutes.

parameters.name: export
parameters.description: Query parameter required to export the API details.

200.description: The response contains a stream with a full set of API metadata and includes API entity with an embedded array of operation entities.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.
